page.title: 14A DAY IN THE LIFE OF NICOLA
page.content: I GET UP ABOUT QUARTER PAST SEVEN. I NORMALLY READ FOR A WHILE. WHEN I HAVE GOT DRESSED I GO DOWNSTAIRS AND FEED BUBBLE AND SQUEAK. AFTER I HAVE BREAKFAST,THEN I DO PIANO PRACTICE. IF THERE'S TIME I DO FLUTE PRACTICE. AFTER SCHOOL I WALK UP TO MRS BANHAM'S AND MY PIANO LESSON. AFTER THAT I WALK HOME. IF IT'S NICE I PLAY OUT WITH CATHERINE FOR A WHILE. AT HALF PAST SEVEN THE HODSONS PICK ME UP AND TAKE ME TO THE SWIMMING CLUB AT BELPER. WE SWIM FROM EIGHT UNTIL NINE. THEN I COME HOME,HAVE SUPPER AND GO TO BED.
